item.title: Human-friendly Domains with Knative
item.description: Introduction Recently, I started playing with Kubernetes and Knative. The trigger was the credits I received to play with Oracle Cloud. I did not know how to use them and on which services (Java is the only Oracle’s product I use :D), so I googled “oracle cloud kubernetes” and 15 minutes later I had a running cluster to play with. Nice! After installing Knative (k apply -f FTW!) and Gloo as a gateway, I decided to move one of my pet projects to this cluster, just to get the feeling of what it takes to run a few services on it.
